entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %

Wind: WSW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
